revision.comment: /* Requested move */ No consensus to move
revision.text:
This article is about a topic that is indeed notable. But it is poorly written and requires a lot of repair work. [[User:Xyz7890|Xyz7890]] ([[User talk:Xyz7890|talk]]) 01:38, 27 September 2009 (UTC) {{WikiProject Judaism|class= stub|importance=low}} ==Requested move==
:''The following discussion is an archived discussion of the proposal. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on the talk page. No further edits should be made to this section. '' '''No consensus''' to move. [[User:Vegaswikian|Vegaswikian]] ([[User talk:Vegaswikian|talk]]) 01:40, 23 May 2011 (UTC) [[Shabbat (Talmud)]] → [[Shabbat (tractate)]] — As article now exists, no need for redirect. [[User:Chesdovi|Chesdovi]] ([[User talk:Chesdovi|talk]]) 01:54, 16 May 2011 (UTC) ===Survey=== :''Feel free to state your position on the renaming proposal by beginning a new line in this section with'' *'''Support''' ''or'' *'''Oppose''''', then sign your comment with'' ~~~~''. Since [[Wikipedia:Polling is not a substitute for discussion|polling is not a substitute for discussion]], please explain your reasons, taking into account [[Wikipedia:Article titles|Wikipedia's policy on article titles]].'' *'''Oppose''' "Talmud" is clearer than "tracate". And you just need to fix the target of the redirect to have it point here. [[Special:Contributions/184.144.163.181|184.144.163.181]] ([[User talk:184.144.163.181|talk]]) 03:38, 16 May 2011 (UTC) ===Discussion=== :''Any additional comments:'' :''The above discussion is preserved as an archive of the proposal. '''Please do not modify it.''' Subsequent comments should be made in a new section on this talk page. No further edits should be made to this section.
